title: Beginner's guide to GitHub: Setting up and securing your profile
description: As part of the GitHub for Beginners guide, learn how to improve the security of your profile and create a profile README. This will let you give your GitHub account a little more personality.

title: Beginner's guide to GitHub: Merging a pull request
description: As part of the GitHub for Beginners guide, learn how to merge pull requests. This will enable you to resolve conflicts when they arise.

title: Beginner's guide to GitHub: Creating a pull request
description: As part of the GitHub for Beginners guide, learn how to create pull requests. This will enable you to suggest changes to existing repositories.

title: Beginner's guide to GitHub: Adding code to your repository
description: Take the next step in our GitHub for Beginners series and add code to your repository. Learn how to create branches and upload changes into a pull request.

title: Beginner's guide to GitHub: Uploading files and folders to GitHub
description: The next step in our GitHub for Beginners series is learning how to add files and folders to your GitHub repository.

title: Beginner's guide to GitHub repositories: How to create your first repo
description: Git started on your first repository in the third installment of GitHub for Beginners. Discover the essential features and settings to manage your projects effectively.

title: Top 12 Git commands every developer must know
description: The latest installment of GitHub for Beginners, where we cover the essential Git commands to get you Git-literate.

title: What is Git? Our beginner's guide to version control
description: Let's get you started on your Git journey with basic concepts to know, plus a step-by-step on how to install and configure the most widely used version control system in the world.

title: Using GitHub Copilot in your IDE: Tips, tricks, and best practices
description: GitHub Copilot is a powerful AI assistant. Learn practical strategies to get the most out of GitHub Copilot to generate the most relevant and useful code suggestions in your editor.

title: 10 unexpected ways to use GitHub Copilot
description: GitHub Copilot is widely known for its code generation feature. Learn how the AI assistant's abilities can extend beyond just code generation.

title: GitHub Certifications are generally available
description: Unlock your full potential with GitHub Certifications! Earning a GitHub certification will give you the competitive advantage of showing up as a GitHub expert.

title: 10 things you didn't know you could do with GitHub Projects
description: Learn how to optimize your usage of GitHub Projects to plan and track your work from idea to production.

title: How to build a GPT-3 App with Nextjs, React, and GitHub Copilot
description: In this step-by-step tutorial, you will learn how to use GitHub Copilot to build an application with OpenAI's gpt-3.5-turbo model.

title: CLI tricks every developer should know
description: Learn some tips, tricks, and tools for mastering the command line from GitHub's own developers.

title: How to automate your dev environment with dev containers and GitHub Codespaces
description: GitHub Codespaces enables you to start coding faster when coupled with dev containers. Learn how to automate a portion of your development environment by adding a dev container to an open source project using GitHub Codespaces.

title: 5 steps to convince your boss to send you to GitHub Universe
description: Here are some actionable tips on how to ask your manager to send you to GitHub Universe this yearâ€”with a free template included!

title: The role software developers play in the cybersecurity space
description: Learn about the role software developers play in the cybersecurity space.

description: Learn about the role software developers play in the cybersecurity space.

title: Why Software Shifted Left
description: Learn why software shifted left and what it means for developers.

title: Leading API Providers Reveal Their Favorite Postman Things
description: Discover the favorite Postman things of leading API providers.

title: Hackathon winner
description: Read about when I won a Hackathon via New Relic 2022 competition.
